title: Unbreakable SEAL
description: Previously published in the Hot Alpha SEALs Anthology  Maxwell Tate fights against a psychotic dream world. His sense of reality is warped until he no longer knows what’s real and what’s not. But the haze is welcome as he struggles to come to grips with the loss of his team. Once in a while an angel spreads her grace to him, easing the fire in his heart. Lacey Adams knows she can’t save all of the injured warriors she comes in contact with, but Max appeals to her more than the rest. Abused by the system he trusted then shuffled away, he’s truly on a downward spiral.  Can she buck the system to salvage the Unbreakable SEAL?
author: J.M. Madden
